docs.title: Home
docs.text:
Version

version is a small cli tool that bumps your version number for you and retrieves the latest version of a specified datasource.

docs.title: Supported versioning schemes
docs.text: Currently, version only supports SemVer 2.0. SemVer 2.0 is one of the most used versioning schemes.

docs.title: Supported datasources
docs.text: Currently, version only supports Docker registries as a datasource. At the moment version doesn't support authentication, but other than that if the docker-cli pulls it, version supports it. This means that among others, ghcr.io hub.docker.com, gcr.io, and docker.pkg.dev are supported.

docs.title: Docker
docs.text: You can run version by running docker run ghcr.io/version-cli/version:0.1.3 ...
